title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.277 - Reclassification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.277 - Reclassification

State Regulations

The process of recasting a hospital's revenue and expense
accounts into a new structure, e.g., moving from a responsibility to a
functional arrangement. For purposes of this manual, the process of converting
the hospital's accounts so as to comply with the prescribed reporting
principles, definitions, listing of accounts and formats found in this manual. An audit trial of the conversion process must be maintained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.277

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
